February 19, 2021
Goop
I think the infiltrators are better for 10pt less. You still get the 50/50 shapechange thanks to Skrulls TA but with only toughness and no stealth they are just going to get zapped way easier.
November 11, 2020
tidge
I believe that all of the FF2020 Skrulls are a cut above the CM Movie Skrulls, but I still find a few minor nits to pick. For this figure, I wish it was 29 points, just so the 30-point General (from the same set) could carry two of these while the INFILTRATION PODS power is showing. In theory, I like the DROP DISGUISE trait: I personally don't like relying on Shape Change as a defense, but if the General has already helped the whole team from being targeted (because a different Skrull made a Shape Change roll), then it won't matter if this one has surrendered the option to attempt defensive rolls.
